title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 40 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 40 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: Moreover the LORD answered Job, and said,
lineList.cn: 耶和华又对约伯说，

lineList.en: Shall he that contendeth with the Almighty instruct him? he that reproveth God, let him answer it.
lineList.cn: 强辩的岂可与全能者争论吗。与神辩驳的可以回答这些吧。

lineList.en: Then Job answered the LORD, and said,
lineList.cn: 于是，约伯回答耶和华说，

lineList.en: Behold, I am vile; what shall I answer thee? I will lay mine hand upon my mouth.
lineList.cn: 我是卑贱的。我用什么回答你呢。只好用手捂口。

lineList.en: Once have I spoken; but I will not answer: yea, twice; but I will proceed no further.
lineList.cn: 我说了一次，再不回答。说了两次，就不再说。

lineList.en: Then answered the LORD unto Job out of the whirlwind, and said,
lineList.cn: 于是，耶和华从旋风中回答约伯说，

lineList.en: Gird up thy loins now like a man: I will demand of thee, and declare thou unto me.
lineList.cn: 你要如勇士束腰。我问你，你可以指示我。

lineList.en: Wilt thou also disannul my judgment? wilt thou condemn me, that thou mayest be righteous?
lineList.cn: 你岂可废弃我所拟定的。岂可定我有罪，好显自己为义吗。

lineList.en: Hast thou an arm like God? or canst thou thunder with a voice like him?
lineList.cn: 你有神那样的膀臂吗。你能像他发雷声吗。

lineList.en: Deck thyself now with majesty and excellency; and array thyself with glory and beauty.
lineList.cn: 你要以荣耀庄严为妆饰，以尊荣威严为衣服。

lineList.en: Cast abroad the rage of thy wrath: and behold every one that is proud, and abase him.
lineList.cn: 要发出你满溢的怒气，见一切骄傲的人，使他降卑。

lineList.en: Look on every one that is proud, and bring him low; and tread down the wicked in their place.
lineList.cn: 见一切骄傲的人，将他制伏，把恶人践踏在本处。

lineList.en: Hide them in the dust together; and bind their faces in secret.
lineList.cn: 将他们一同隐藏在尘土中，把他们的脸蒙蔽在隐密处。

lineList.en: Then will I also confess unto thee that thine own right hand can save thee.
lineList.cn: 我就认你右手能以救自己。

lineList.en: Behold now behemoth, which I made with thee; he eateth grass as an ox.
lineList.cn: 你且观看河马。我造你也造它。它吃草与牛一样。

lineList.en: Lo now, his strength is in his loins, and his force is in the navel of his belly.
lineList.cn: 它的气力在腰间，能力在肚腹的筋上。

lineList.en: He moveth his tail like a cedar: the sinews of his stones are wrapped together.
lineList.cn: 它摇动尾巴如香柏树。它大腿的筋互相联络。

lineList.en: His bones are as strong pieces of brass; his bones are like bars of iron.
lineList.cn: 它的骨头好像铜管。它的肢体彷佛铁棍。

lineList.en: He is the chief of the ways of God: he that made him can make his sword to approach unto him.
lineList.cn: 它在神所造的物中为首。创造它的给它刀剑。

lineList.en: Surely the mountains bring him forth food, where all the beasts of the field play.
lineList.cn: 诸山给它出食物，也是百兽游玩之处。

lineList.en: He lieth under the shady trees, in the covert of the reed, and fens.
lineList.cn: 它伏在莲叶之下，卧在芦苇隐密处和水洼子里。

lineList.en: The shady trees cover him with their shadow; the willows of the brook compass him about.
lineList.cn: 莲叶的阴凉遮蔽它。溪旁的柳树环绕它。

lineList.en: Behold, he drinketh up a river, and hasteth not: he trusteth that he can draw up Jordan into his mouth.
lineList.cn: 河水泛滥，它不发战。就是约旦河的水涨到它口边，也是安然。

lineList.en: He taketh it with his eyes: his nose pierceth through snares.
lineList.cn: 在它防备的时候，谁能捉拿它。谁能牢笼它穿它的鼻子呢。
